entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 20. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:31 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
